snippet: The abusive grilling last month of a female midshipman is further evidence that the military’s criminal justice system is seriously flawed.
abstract: Editorial contends abusive interrogation of a female midshipman who accused three former Naval Academy football players of raping her provides further evidence that the military's handling of sexual assault complaints is seriously flawed; calls on the Senate to pass bill introduced by Sen Kirsten Gillibrand that would give independent, professionally trained military prosecutors the power to decide which sexual assault and other serious cases to try.
lead_paragraph: The abusive grilling last month of a female midshipman is further evidence that the military’s criminal justice system is seriously flawed.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
